data('ozone')

fit2 <- lm(ozone ~ poly(temperature, 2, raw=TRUE), data = ozone)
fit3 <- lm(ozone ~ poly(temperature, 3, raw=TRUE), data = ozone)
fit4 <- lm(ozone ~ poly(temperature, 4, raw=TRUE), data = ozone)
